I was prejudiced against hentai for a long while, I thought it was nothing but tentacles and monsters, but then I went in and checked it out, and there's so much more in there. From mundane housewife tales to epic angel/devil battles.

And quite honestly, I think hentai is artistically of a better quality than your typical live-action American porn. The plots are better, the soundtracks are better, the camerawork is better, just about everything is better. Live-action porn is often incredibly cheesy and badly acted so that you can't sympathize with the characters at all. Hentai has some great characters and it gets you really hot when you can feel for the characters.

I think hentai trumps live-action porn in pretty much every way, but especially in being able to form a better emotional connection with the characters than you can when Silvia Saint is sucking her three hundreth cock.
